id_not_valid: Id passed as parameter is not valid for the current resource.
no_user: There is no user with the provided information.
signin_error: Password is incorrect for the provided user.
unauth_access: Unautherized access. Token expired or is not valid.
request_send_successfully: Request sent to the requested user successfully
incorrect_user_id: User Id passed is not correct.
invalid_request: Request Id passed is not correct
invalid_user_request: Friend Request does not belong to the user
no_friend: Specified Friend Id is not friend with the user
